title: Diana or Leona
body: Who do you think is cooler?

replies.body:
I voted for Diana because:
The dark side of the moon is more cooler then ice.(I think this is right I didn't do any research. I'm probably not ment to.)
Leona is using the sun which isn't cool because its boiling.
and Poppy well she isn't cool because she knocks you so high you hit the sun then get sent back to base.
I want to say "Praise the Sun!", but Diana is such a cool champ.

THERE CAN BE.

ONLY ONE VOTE.
The coolest champion there is obviously Anivia guys. Don't you love it when they dive you and forget about your passive? {{champion:34}}

I got a triple kill that way once....I was playing Anivia in support. 

It was like you could see the hope fading from their eyes as they made the decision to stick around after killing my ADC, then again when they decided they'd committed too much to killing me to just back out. It died completely when I rebirthed with 100 HP and stunned the pain in the butt Lee Sin that was about to kill me, earning that sweet sweet triple just by existing.
I'd say diana but her lore makes her out to be a bit of a bitch. Cool kit but nasty back story.

Diana is the only LoL champion to ever act as a background on my phones lock screen xD

PS Leona is super lame.
